name: OK Golf HD
description:
OK Golf HD is a relaxing game of golf played on miniature courses - a unique blend of real golf and mini-golf with a few hidden treasures for good measure!

No caddies. No clubs. Just you and the ball. Play a quick round on beautiful diorama courses inspired by classic golfing destinations and enjoy a moment of zen while you play a round of golf immersed in the calming sounds of nature.

Definitive Experience


With more than 170 holes played on 16 courses OK Golf is a full-fledged golfing experience in a miniature package.

Plus, we've improved the look of the game for the big screen, and touched just about every part of the game so that it looks and plays better!

More than OK


Aim, pull and release to shoot the ball. It might be easy to learn, but that only makes it hard to put(t) down.

  • Unlock holes as you progress through the game and find secret holes hidden throughout the game to unlock new areas.
  • Challenge yourself and test your skills with Championship and Time Play.
  • Compete in multiplayer against your friends to see who's more than just OK!
  • Locked home? No internet? No problem! Both online and local multiplayer are supported.

Plus, you can now customize your ball for a touch of personality!

KO Golf


We've not just added real-time multiplayer, but also KO Golf mode, where the rules of golf are flipped and you battle it out on each hole for points and survival against other players!

  • Survive the melee and make it to the hole in one piece...
  • Dash past hazards, gaps and treacherous friends.
  • Blast your opponents off course, or into the hole!

It's not real golf, but it's OK!
